meanings.definition: A small circular object or ornament.
meanings.sent1: She collected colorful rondels to decorate her room.
meanings.sent2: The necklace was adorned with shiny rondels.
meanings.sent3: The rondels on the bracelet sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up when she saw the beautiful rondels on display.
meanings.sent5: The rondels added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.sent1: The children danced in a joyful circle, performing rondels.
meanings.sent2: The traditional folk dance included lively rondels.
meanings.sent3: The rondels at the dance competition were full of energy.
meanings.sent4: The music filled the room as they twirled in intricate rondels.
meanings.sent5: The community gathered to celebrate with cheerful rondels.

meanings.definition: A small circular window or opening.
meanings.sent1: She peeked through the rondels to see who was outside.
meanings.sent2: The old castle had mysterious rondels in its walls.
meanings.sent3: The rondels in the door allowed a glimpse of the garden.
meanings.sent4: Moonlight streamed in through the rondels, casting shadows.
meanings.sent5: The stained glass rondels created a beautiful pattern of light.
